components.description: New for 07 M4 manipulated alloy frame, butted ORE DT, disc only, forged dropouts w/ replaceable 98954020 derailleur hanger

Specialized 3D forged alloy, four bolt, 31.8mm, 7 degree rise
Alloy 31.8mm Butted XC rise, 640mm wide, 8 degree back, 6 degree up sweep, 3.2mm thick

Avid Juicy 3, hydraulic disc, 6" G2 Clean Sweep rotor
Shimano HG-73, 1/2" x 3/32" w/ missing link
Shimano FCM-540, Hollowtech, Octalink Spline, replacable rings with alloy outer
Shimano ES-25, Octalink Spline, cartridge bearing, 68 x 118mm for 50mm chainline
Specialized/Alex RHD 26, double wall disc w/ eyelets
Specialized Hi Lo disc, 32h, CNC flange and disc mount, polished races, alloy QR
Specialized MTB butted 6061, two bolt micro adjust, 30.9mm
